{{Infobox Berry |name = Spelon |image = [[File:Spelon.png]] |caption = So spicy is the Spelon Berry that, Fire type or not, Pok√©mon will try to breathe fire after eating a single one. |growtime = 4h 18m 0s |harvest = 30 berries |replant = 10% |points = 900 |flavor = {{!}} 30{{!}} 10 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 }} '''Spelon''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]].
